fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Select a player to occupy their house.
- Select a player to attack them. They must be reachable by moving in the same direction that you moved through occupying (you cannot go to 1 by going past the end and vice versa). You must have moved to occupy a player's house last night to use this.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your abilities consider your current occupied space as your spot on the playerlist, not your actual spot.
- You learn the role of the player's house you're occupying.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Protect the King from checkmate and deliver mate to the enemy.
